tweet: Today, Cardano 1.5 has been released on the Cardano testnet in preparation for the later release to the mainnet. This release is a milestone because it is the last Cardano release of the Byron development phase. Read more about this testnet release here:  https://t.co/NaVbUDwbrz

All of us in the Cardano community are familiar with the brilliant chief technical architect of Cardano at IOHK, Duncan Coutts! Come out to the IOHK Summit for a chance to meet him and listen to his presentation!  https://t.co/BHVgqjS8ZG #IOHKSummit2019  https://t.co/w47fTsL15m

Happy #InternationalWomensDay  #Cardano's underlying #cryptocurrency goes by the ticker ADA after Ada Lovelace, Lord #Byron's daughter, who is recognized as the world's first computer programmer!   RT $Ada #Ada
Special shoutout to all the amazing women at IOHK contributing to the Cardano ecosystem! Happy International Women's Day! #IWD2019 #InternationalWomensDay  https://t.co/qV4mumiiTs

IOHK summit happening next month. @CardanoEffect will be there. Here's what the Miami Convention Center looks like. Thanks @berrydonttweet #cardano #IOHKSummit2019 #Miami  https://t.co/unAzIdPCZ1  https://t.co/ektkUjoIBH

Glad to see other projects like @ethereum in the footsteps of @Cardano with implementing the K framework & formal verification. @Cointelegraph: worth noting is the #KEVM, which was developed by @rv_inc (who build for @NASA) in collab w/ + funding from @InputOutputHK @IOHK_Charles
